definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Female bodybuilding is the female component of competitive bodybuilding.
sentences.chinese: 女子健美是競技性健美運動的一部分。

sentences.english: More and more people go in for body-building.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的人喜歡上了健美運動。
